Articles.Content:
My friend and I started some ridiculously absurd production company, wherein we make equally preposterous videos which rewrite history and live in a land where the streets are paved with gold.

Nixon is president in this universe.

Anyway, we put two short together today.

The best part is, every one of our little clips is exactly 1 minute and 19 seconds long (even if YouTube says 1:20, it's lying... It skips a second sometimes.) so if you have a bad attention span, this will be no issue for you.

Oswald, the TRUE story of the JFK Assassination.

V&, which is about. Well...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UjGCL7hVx-M

We're going to be working on a collection of others, so we wanted to let those who are interested have a look and judge for themselves. Are these hard facts believable? Etc.
